website_summaries.verdict: Surprisingly roomy wallet for the price. The one to get if cost is an issue.
pros: A lot of slots and compartments for the price
Two compartments for currency and paper products
cons: Can be bulky if fully loaded
Compartments may be sewn too tightly for easy money handling

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the wallet based on the good reviews. The wallet started to show signs of ...
customer_reviews.text: The reviews of this product, in my opinion, miss the mark. I purchased the wallet based on the good reviews. The wallet started to show signs of wear after two days of use (as shown in the picture). I'd look elsewhere if I were you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Slim at All
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wallet because I was looking for something slim that would not be bulky in my hip pocket. I put three credit cards, a driver's license, insurance card, and three ID cards in this wallet, and it was very bulky--just as bulky as the wallet it was replacing, which was not advertised as a "slimline" wallet. The wallet itself is attractive and seems durable, but if the reason you are purchasing is because of the "slimline" description, this is not for you. I do not use this wallet (didn't bother to return it), but I ultimately got the, which I absolutely love.
customer_reviews.author: JVH

customer_reviews.title: Poor Wallet Design Makes the Wallet Totally Impractical
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is useless. OK - I expect the slots for the credit cards to be firm so that the cards will not fall out, but they are so tight that it is very difficult to push a card in. Once you have one in, the one in the enxt slot IMPOSSIBLE to insert. The card in slot four hides the card in slot three in each column...so you cannot see one card in each column. That is 25% of the problem; it took me three times as long to get them out so I could return the wallet!
customer_reviews.author: Peter B. Drayson

customer_reviews.title: Almost, but not quite
customer_reviews.text: The wallet looks good but depending upon how big your wallet pocket is, the metal logo will present a small yet visible bump in your pocket. Kind of weird. I wish I had noticed it before ordering it, and if I had it to do over again I'd order something without a logo like that. Additionally, the design of the wallet makes it very difficult to actually fill very many of the credit card slots. The wallet gets extremely thick and it becomes difficult to select a specific card and remove it when needed. This wallet is probably best for people with no more than one ID card (2 max) and no more than 2-3 credit/debit cards max.
customer_reviews.author: LTex

customer_reviews.title: Really chic soft leather wallet
customer_reviews.text: Really like the feel of the leather. My previous wallet was obviously not leather and was starting to chip and peel. This one will hopefully look good for a while. Lots of pockets and two ID holders are really helpful, as is the two pocket bill holder. It's nice to have a pocket for ones and fives, separate from the one for tens and twenties (and an occasional hundred!)
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kaun

customer_reviews.title: Good wallet for carrying less credit cards!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good wallet. I have had the same brand and type before. The only issue is that you cannot put standard size credit cards on every slot. They are a bit snug. There are three segments for credit cards with 4 slots in each. The segment behind the photo ID slot is the worst. The top two slots are OK, but the bottom two are useless. But over all it is a good wallet and you should not be carrying that many credit cards anyway!!
customer_reviews.author: eM Pe

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet for the price
customer_reviews.text: I been using this wallet for a few weeks now. I replaced my old one which was a chain wallet. It took some time to get used to. I'm not sure if it blocks rifd scanners or not. Its not a big problem here where I live. But it has a nice smooth feel to the wallet. The only downsize it that it feels cheaply made where you purchase your ID. One of the corner is fading after having it for 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Ernest

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong after one year
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is probably the best wallet I have ever owned. Very durable, comfortable, and I really like this style of tri-fold design. It has held up extremely well over the last year. Much better than the last couple of wallets I have owned (where the liner starts falling out after a few months). I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: AdamHD

customer_reviews.title: Repurchased, lasted 4 years
customer_reviews.text: Bought my husband one 4 years ago and it wore out but he liked it so much I was happy to repurchase it! It is nice and thin and breaks in nicely. He is rough on stuff being a contractor, it is in and out of his pocket and banged around every day. Lasts about twice as long as other wallets he has had. I could see it lasting very long for someone who uses it lightly.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferGill

customer_reviews.title: Only lasts a few years.
customer_reviews.text: My wallet is falling apart, and low and I realize i bought this same wallet in 2016 (four years ago) and the plastic ID part is falling apart. Good value, but don't buy this wallet if you want more than a few years out of it. My last wallet before this was (don't laugh) a Trump International brand wallet that I had over ten years.
customer_reviews.author: Tim F

customer_reviews.title: Quality Wallet
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Alpine Swiss wallet. I wanted the RFID protection (my six year old one doesn't have that) so I bought the new one. I think my old one would have lasted me another 2 or 3 years. My credit cards, license, and other information all fit very nicely into the wallet. I am once again pleased with a quality wallet that Alpine Swiss makes.
customer_reviews.author: Btous

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet
customer_reviews.text: Received it last night and after a bit of a fight getting it out of the box (box is kind of tight and the wallet is not set to be easy to take out) I immediately moved my cards and what not to it. The only thing stopping this from getting a 5 star is that the windowed slots are tight and make it a bit harder than needs be to take out your driver's license or put it back.
customer_reviews.author: P Long

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Had my last for about 6 years. Time for a new one. Works as advertised. Even blocks my car key fob if behind the wallet in my pocket. Inexpensive enough to buy every 5-6 years.
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: Top quality wallet
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this wallet was evident right out of the box. I wish I had ordered two - but this one will likely last years. VERY well made. Love the RFID protection too.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Nice conventional wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good leather conventional wallet that could handle more than 2 cards and a drivers license, this wallet definitely can you can tell instantly it is well made and it has plenty of space for cards and others things you might want to carry in your wallet I would recommend this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Wendell J

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Husband here:. Love this wallet. I like the fold design. I put the less used cards behind the flip out, commonly used ones in front. Cash fits in great, fits good in my pocket and the size actually makes it more comfortable to sit on if you happen to do so. Recommend to men who want a sleek yet simple and functional wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Marion-Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: ID stuck in window
customer_reviews.text: The reason for me to consider this wallet vs others was that it has a thumb slider but when I used it the ID stuck in the window and it was quite hard to get ID sliding out. I looked closer and saw that right at the edge of the window the ID was caught by a little bump where the bottom fabric met the leather. This totally negated the idea of having the thumb slider for convenience especially at the airport security where I had things on my other hand and tried to use 1 hand to get the ID out. The thumb slider is a good idea but ruined by bad production.
customer_reviews.author: Capilano

customer_reviews.title: Looks brand new after 3 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 3 years ago for my brother for Christmas. It still looks brand new. It has been used and abused and it still looks perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jory Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Lots of slots - which is what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Like many people, I have several credit cards and each one offers a bonus but only with certain purchases - grocery, food, gas, hotel, etc. and I would get my wallet out to pay and forget I had other cards hidden inside and just grab the first -- Now I can see all the cards so I can remember which one to use and maximize the benefits from each card
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: It lasted a year.
customer_reviews.text: I hate to leave a bad review. However I bought this for my husband in JULY 2016. As of today we bought him a new wallet. It did stand up well to his constant abuse of it. He's a card collector. And he packs so much in it. So I suppose for light use it'd be okay but for someone who is constantly trades business cards, or grabs business cards almost nearly everywhere he does it wasn't going to work well. The only thing that ripped really was the clear plastic bit over the ID.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hill

customer_reviews.title: Nice material, lots of storage, but thick
customer_reviews.text: Having had this for about a week, my initial impression is that the leather looks and feels like good quality. There is a ton of storage on this wallet, enough for 12 cards in the individual slots, plus room for more cards under each fold, plus the clear plastic display. The downside of all this storage is that it definitely makes a Costanza wallet. Between IDs, loyalty cards, and credit cards, I only have 10 cards in mine, so not even near capacity, and it's sitting at 1 1/4 inches thick.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P Shanahan

customer_reviews.title: ... the strip on the back making the card no good and have had a nother card start to break ...
customer_reviews.text: Updated my rating on this wallet to one star originally gave five stars to the first appearance of product product is a nice-looking product but the placement of the credit cards in the wallet I've had one credit card snap down the line of the strip on the back making the card no good and have had a nother card start to break so I can only carry one or two cards in the wallet if you put too much in there they want to break on you design of wallet is no good
customer_reviews.author: James Granger

customer_reviews.title: It solves the crdit card storage problem.
customer_reviews.text: In today's world, most men carry a LOT of plastic cards, ...Credit Cards, Big Box store Charge Cards, Driver's License, Auto Insurance Cards, Medicare and Health Cards, Membership Cards, Family Photos, etc., etc., etc. One needs a lot of pockets to hold all this stuff. This Alpine Swiss Trifold Wallet does the job in style. If it had 2 money pockets it would be perfect, but it's still WAY more practical; than other wallets at any price
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: This is put together well enough but I like to load my billfold up with lots of cards
customer_reviews.text: This is put together well enough but I like to load my billfold up with lots of cards . Unfortunately on the one I got the dimensions of the slots for the cards is very tight and when I put cards in the spaces behind the card slots it caused the billfold to buckle which caused me to return it. If you were not planning on using these spaces and used only the cards in the slots and cash in the billfold itself it would be ok...
customer_reviews.author: NAKED TRUTH

customer_reviews.title: The leather is nice and if you are not using credit cards
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item because it appears to be an outdated wallet and current credit cards a bigger and heavier and cannot insert (it you managed to get one it, you'd need a pair of pliers to get it out. The leather is nice and if you are not using credit cards, this will probably suit you for the price. It would most likely bulge way too big otherwise. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: JC Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Too Slim crumples money
customer_reviews.text: I had the older version of this and wore it out. I bought the new one last year and was excited to get it. They said it was new slimmer style. This is a problem. I put credit cards in the 12 pockets and my driver's license in the window pocket. When I put money in it, the money gets crumbled at the top edge because the wallet is not tall enough. Please make this wallet taller so when you really use it and put things in it, it is not too slim. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: honoluluguy808

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wallet. I needed a replacement for my old trifold, and this is just as good if not better. The swiss logo bumps out and I am a little afraid I will tear it off. Also, for my England friends, it does not fit a 20-pound bill but all other money fits without a problem. Overall, a great wallet, definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for the perfect someone
customer_reviews.text: I like the spaciousness of the wallet. In addition, I like how the wallet still smells of leather after a month of use. if I were to get somebody a wallet, I would choose this one. Great for gifts, yourself or anyone that wants a nice genuine leather wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Faulisi

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for both me and my dad a little over a year ago, and they still aren't showing signs of wear! It's much smaller than most wallets, which makes it fit into my pocket so much easier and generally just makes it look cooler than the bricks some people carry around. It has a place for my license, a coin pouch, a bill pouch, and 12 different card slots, although I've managed to fit 2 cards into a single slot when need be. Downsides are that the slots are tight so sometimes it's hard to pull my cards out and that the coin pouch holds so few coins it's practically useless.
customer_reviews.author: Kim W

customer_reviews.title: Leather is good but cards bend and crack
customer_reviews.text: Purchased March 19, 2016. He used to keep a little metal plate in it for work. Since changing jobs and removing the plate, the cards inside started bending and cracking. Three stars because the leather is still in good shape, but useless if everything in it requires replacement, including driver IDs that cost money to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Emily B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wallet for leather fans!
customer_reviews.text: How much wallet will $15 get you in 2016? My last wallet was cowboy leather and lasted thirty years... hence leather was a prerequisite for me. What I like most about the design is the window fold out and the hidden fold out card slots. Some of my paper ID products needed to be cut down a bit to fit the slots, which seem to be made for credit cards, but this was no bother. Lying flat on a desktop, the thickness was a bit more than I liked. In defense of the design, one must consider that I still need to break in the leather and can assume that over time it will flatten even more.
customer_reviews.author: BiteMyTaco

customer_reviews.title: No discomfort and lots of space!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchase this wallet on Amazon.com after searching tirelessly since I'm so selective with wallets. I decided on this one because of the storage space available inside it. I was NOT disappointed when I received it. There is a ton of space inside without making the wallet too bulky. When it's in my back pocket and full, there is not the discomfort I always have with other wallets. I would not hesitate to buy another when it's time to replace the one I purchased. I love Alpine Swiss products anyway so this was just another win.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great product reluctantly returned.
customer_reviews.text: While I did not expect it the wallet was identical with my current wallet which I am trying reduce in size. The new wallet is beautiful but I returned it since it did not meet my size expectations. And I thank Amazon for making the return possible.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN CLEARY

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an inexpensive, but nice wallet as the vehicle to present a gift. Rather than giving money in an envelope, I liked the idea of putting gift cards in the credit card slots or cash in the billfold. Since the real gift was the cash & gift cards, I didn't want to spend too much on the wallet, but still wanted a decent wallet. This was perfect! Well made for an inexpensive wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Stupid choices.
customer_reviews.text: Roughly 3 months after buying it and it still holds up well enough. The 3 star review is for the dumb cross button on the wallet. The stupid button sticks out pretty significantly and would always get caught on my pocket lip. This is like the worst branding imaginable for something like this, They could have easily branded the leather, or had a cloth insert, but no they had a stupid out of place button. I would most likely not get again if given the choice if for only this reason. Hopefully the quality of the rest of the wallet holds up for the next 9 months or so to get a year out of it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wojciechowski

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Went from a traditional tri-fold to this. It fits in my pockets well, has enough slots for my cards, but I don’t carry many - has six to eight slots. The color options are nice, as I usually only see black and brown in leather(ish) finishes.
customer_reviews.author: PapaJuan NC

customer_reviews.title: It arrived earlier than expected and is in good shape. It had a nice packaging to protect ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived earlier than expected and is in good shape. It had a nice packaging to protect it from ship;ping demons and seems nice looking. Haven't used it much and i'll complete this review once I used it for long enough. - So far it had been holding up nicely. I keep it in my pocket almost all the time so it is expected for it to get a nice a** curve on it soon. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Behnam Saeedi

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, smells strange
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of this wallet, it has the perfect amount of space and is compact. It has a very strange smell though, right out of the box. Kind of mix between some type of cheap perfume and processed bonded leather, meh hopefully it'll go away over time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rud

customer_reviews.title: A very nice tri-fold wallet
customer_reviews.text: This wallet will hold plenty of cards. If you have more than it can accommodate, you probably need to get rid of some! The materials are of high quality, and the craftsmanship is, too.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Everything seems great for a wallet at this price point except one important thing. The wallet isn't tall enough to support receipts without them sticking out the top. Really!? Maybe a gas station receipt would be fine but not your normal width ones. So a bit disappointed that I'll have to fold them in half from now on... Not going to return as it's not worth the effort and it's a quality build for the price. Update 11/21/17 I decided to upgrade this to 4 stars. The slim design is really worth whatever it lacks in height. I'd adapted to folding receipts. The wallet has held up very well and shows little sign of wear.
customer_reviews.author: JJovo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing wallet! Very happy with it. Perfect size with the right amount of card slots for it. Cards to fit snug in them but I am happy with that so they don't slip out. Very impressed with the wallet and love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Too small for cards to squeeze in, bad design
customer_reviews.text: This wallet do provide 4 card slots in a column, but it is so tight, almost impossibly, to squeeze 4 cards in the same column. I am sure this wallet is gonna explode if you load it full with cards.
customer_reviews.author: Robin.H

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product it is the second one I have bought
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product it is the second one I have bought. I am rough on my wallets and they usually only last a year at best. I had my previous one for 3 years it still looks great. I only got a new one because I am very particular about my wallet. The last one was still in good enough shap one of my friends wanted it when I got my new one. Great product thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my husband. It’s wider than any wallet he’s ever had before but it does fit in his pocket. He was unsure if he would like it at first but now he does. It seems well made and looks like it will hold up for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Buy
customer_reviews.text: Upon arrival, the wallet was packaged very nicely. As I tore into the wallet, the first thing I noticed is how extravagant the leather is. Plenty of room for all of my cards and the wad of cash I wish I had. Overall great buy! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, back pocket wallet
customer_reviews.text: This wallet had just the right amount of storage slots for my ID and credit cards. The two photo ID holders were a bit on the tight side (PA IDs), but they were actually looser than my old wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Dewey Bumstead

customer_reviews.title: Close, but not exactly what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet to replace my existing wallet that was the same description. The new one is almost identical but not totally. It is just a fraction of an inch smaller and does not have two bill pockets as the old one did. However, it has as many card slots and will work for me. The workmanship and finish are the same as the original and quite adequate. I'm just disappointed that it is not exactly what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: AE Crouch

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet!
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that some of the card slots are REALLY tight. Hopefully they will break in after time and usage. Other than that, this is a great wallet. It had no defects out of the box. It's nice, soft, and flexible. The leather seems like it will hold up. I like the functionality of trifold wallets but don't like them overall. This was a great median for me I got the functionality of a trifold with a bifold feel. All at a reasonable price. Great as a gift or for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Wallet
customer_reviews.text: It was for my husband. I cannot write any review in such a short time. We don’t know if it’s durable, good quality until he uses it for a while. The wallet looks good but we will see if it stays good with time. The only thing I can say is he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Jouj

customer_reviews.text: I like this wallet. Wry much. I tried another type wallet with a money clip and didn’t like it. This wallet has lots of card slots and is nicely designed. Nice form factor. Highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff P.

customer_reviews.title: Too Shallow for Receipts
customer_reviews.text: Pluses- The product description is accurate and it seems well stitched. Cons- I have used it for two weeks and so will gift it to Goodwill in lieu of returning. A few of the card slots are too narrow to fit cards easily but they give you 12 slots so that it is no big deal. The dealbreaker for me is that the billfold is too shallow. It accomodates U.S, currency fine but it is too narrow to accomodate the standard width of credit card receipts (unless you are willing to fold them in half sideways, ha) This is why I have only given it three stars. See pics
customer_reviews.author: DaveSF

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect...
customer_reviews.text: Has a retail price card from Alpine Swiss inside when opened that lists it as $49. I believe it. It's actually a very nice wallet, and it will probably hold up for many years! My only grip is that it's a bit on the large side, so when I wear board shorts or anything without a back pocket, it awkwardly sticks out of my pocket and I'm afraid I'm going to lose it. But the price is right; the quality is there...just wish it was a bit smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wallet. Roomy and durable. Gave two as gifts, both recipients are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: YashasMom

customer_reviews.title: Many Features
customer_reviews.text: In need of a wallet? Look no further, I purchased this wallet when I was in a situation like you. I needed a wallet. This wallet has so many card holders! It’s amazing! All my gift cards, credit cards, debit cards, and all the miscellaneous cards I want! Has stayed quite durable and kept it’s nice appearance the same! I’d recommend this item to almost anyone who has more than 3 cards.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Torres

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Well I looked awhile for MY specific needs and this wallet fit MINE Perfectly Comfortable and seems to be of very good quality. Ask me again in 4 or 5years about durability.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J. Diiorio

customer_reviews.title: It's not great, not terrible.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice enough wallet, but it's a bit bulky for a bifold - because it's really a trifold in disguise, like the world's worst Transformer. The slots on the back of the driver's license flipout are too narrow to hold credit cards, so other than business cards, I'm not sure what's supposed to go back there. On the other hand, the driver's license flipout is permanently attached, which isn't common, and the slots in the rest of the wallet are snug and secure. For the price, it's a great wallet that so far seems well-made. I would get another one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Garner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always enjoyed this company’s quality products. I tried a travando wallet recently but not even close to quality. Excellent durability and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: I like Alpine Swiss and will be taking another look at ...
customer_reviews.text: I always stress out when time to buy a new wallet. Seriously a wallet made of leather gradually conforms to the person and becomes individual. My last one was solid leather. I just wore it out. With apprehension I ordered this one and it was a first time hit. The tri fold holds all my cards and IDs. Solid semi soft leather. Solid construction simple design. I like Alpine Swiss and will be taking another look at some of their other products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph N. Mastrota

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional style, quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for husband for Christmas and gave one as gift to son in law. They both loved them! I can see why... the look and quality and style is exceptional for price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: dp

customer_reviews.title: Decent wallet but has some flaws.
customer_reviews.text: The slots for credit cards are a too snug - expecially when most of them are filled. The plastic on the drivers license area cracked after only a few months, so I have to keep that in one of the other slots now. I hadn't realized the "slimmer" sizing would be as slim as it is. I usually keep business receipts in my wallet, but this wallet is so "slim" that they always stick out of the bill section. The other parts of the wallet are holding up well and seem fairly durable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Best wallet ever. Even fully loaded it is still slim. Keep in mind that it accomplishes this by being a little wider than standard wallets. If you have narrow pockets it might not work or be a tight fit. Works with all my pants and shorts. Love that it still very slim. Shipped fast and high quality. Impossible to find comparable item in brick and mortar stores.
customer_reviews.author: Biggunn61

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet! plenty space in there!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second wallet purchased from this brand, very durable and comfortable to use! I love how much space it has to store cards! highly recommended purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Ivanoff Oller de los Santos

customer_reviews.title: Nice replacement or as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace a 10 year old wallet that accidentally went through the wash. This wallet was a good choice. This wallet is slimmer than some others as it only has one pocket for cash, which is all I needed. There are 8 pockets for credit cards however really only 6 are useable as if you use the lower pocket on each side it blocks the pocket directly above. So, I just use the top three on each side. This is a minor quibble. There are also three hidden slots (one under each section) to hold additional items. Overall a very nice wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Dan The Man

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but it *is* RFID blocking
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought this wallet in order to get a non-RFID-blocking wallet (as it would mess with my use of a local transit card). However the wallet as received has stickers on the box/package saying it is RFID-blocking certified. Otherwise appears to be good quality and well made. I will probably just keep it and deal with it :)
customer_reviews.author: Simon Cartoon

customer_reviews.title: A perfectly fine wallet.  Should last another 5 to 10 years.
customer_reviews.text: The little flip out part can hold your cards in the clear plastic window so they can be scanned without removing them from the wallet.
customer_reviews.author: tkrjhw

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for buck!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wallet for the price! I love it! It holds everything that I would normally carry and has a few more pockets to stow some more items. There are two sections to keep bills which I use one for actual dollars and the other for receipts. The wallet is really well made. The materials used is nice and the stitching is clean and sturdy. The small Alpine logo is minimalistic and not an eyesore. Overall I am pleased with my purchase. If mine ever gets worn out I would definitely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: C. I. Manorina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot of room in my wallet. I impressed a couple of girls with it. It is still in great condition even after all these months. I would strongly recommend this and I would love to try more products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian A.

customer_reviews.title: Fast Service and Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I purchased this wallet for my dad. It is very well made. I am also happy with the short time it took to get here. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Twin A

customer_reviews.title: Tight Wad
customer_reviews.text: So far I like it although it's a little tight getting credtit cards in some of the sleeves. We will see if they loosen up but otherwise it's a nice wallet and exactly as described. Update - I'm very happy with it. Plenty of room for cards, etc. I still have a couple of card slots that are just a touch too tight but that is not unusual in a wallet. My only wish would be that the window pocket was a touch bigger so I could keep a few business cards in there. Oh well...still keeping the 4 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: It's not leather. Close but....
customer_reviews.text: Wallet is great, holds like 10 cards and my cash and papers and stuff. When full the wallet is like 3 inches thick.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & feel.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a number of different wallets as gifts and this one is always a favorite. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: penn

customer_reviews.title: I replaced one I wore out
customer_reviews.text: I had this exact wallet. Eventually the insides wore through into the dollar bill section. I got a new one . I like mine,
customer_reviews.author: RDRR

customer_reviews.title: Medium build with flexible expansion
customer_reviews.text: This is a good performer in the midsized men's wallets. It's built fairly slim and tight but has many pockets for cards & ID. I am a fan of the newer minimalist wallets in different situations but for daily use this is the one I want. Qq
customer_reviews.author: Wascallywabbit

customer_reviews.title: OK, but not too great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wallet to replace an old Alpine Swiss wallet that had been very good. I am not sure if I didn't read the description carefully enough, but it does not have two currency compartments like my old one did. More importantly, the card slots are smaller than most of my cards. Thus, there is a very snug fit for credit cards, etc. I assume that the slots will expand with use but it is a bit difficult to struggle to remove and replace credit cards, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell Sever

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit and function of the wallet. Seems to be put together well. It is still in the process of the break in time.
customer_reviews.author: James A Kemmerlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wallet for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This wallet substituted my Fossil wallet which was a high-quality item and I must say it is very practical, nice-looking and roomy, it has also great quality, I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: music lover

customer_reviews.title: Exquisite
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten things from Alpine Swiss before never fails expert crafting and quality a must have for the person on a budget but wants nice things!
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Second one I have purchased. First one lasted twice as long as a Timberland version I paid 4x as much for! Like it so much, I bought another one after the first wore out.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good Wallet, but the Clear ID Holder Deteriorates Quickly
customer_reviews.text: I liked this wallet, it had enough space for all of my (lots of) credit and gift cards. Finally deteriorated beyond use and needed to be replaced after about 4.5 years. The only thing that sticks out as a negative is that the clear ID holder wore out very quickly (within 6 months) and I had to put my IDs in the credit card pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Gifted to son
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to my son. He likes it but I can’t speak of the quality or durability as it was shipped to him directly.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndie

customer_reviews.title: What is not to like
customer_reviews.text: My wallet was lost on the subway, actually, my pocket was picked. I do not think he was after the money, because I had none in it, it was the wallet. So I went and ordered another one before I went to get my ID.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best wallet ever
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product honestly the best wallet I’ve ever owned. Still looks brand new to this day!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Ghostley

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: My husband goes through a few wallets a year normally (well, after I made him get rid of his 20 year old canvas wallet). This one, however, has lasted 2 years and is showing very little wear. We'd definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: No nonsense wallet at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect amount of credit card slots for my needs, a divider in the bill fold portion would have been nice but not a necessity. No real downside I can see. Quality feel, nothing torn or burst yet.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Kurash

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice leather. Husband really likes this wallet, and he is very particular about his wallet, but the last wallet he had, did not have RFID protection.
customer_reviews.author: ARLENE CASTELL-WHITE

customer_reviews.title: Good wallet
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day and the quality of leather/durability is great. Not a lot to say, as it is a wallet...it wallets well. Plenty of storage, cards are held securely, and it is not too thick for your back pocket if you sit for a career.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Partner loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two weeks ago and it’s doing great so far! My partner constantly tells me thank you and that it’s not as bulky as he thought it would be. Hope it stands up to the time test. Will be updating my review in 3-6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Z-Trio

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: It's been 3 years and if this wallet were to fall apart today I would not have a complaint but it is still in perfect condition I keep about 15 different cards in it the left side is tight so I put non magnetic cards there and trimmed them a little and yes it's fat ... do you want a skinny wallet put less cards in it for 15 bucks I am extremely happy with this wallet
customer_reviews.author: dbcooper

customer_reviews.title: Great Item, Fast Shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shipping And After 3 wallets and 10 Years With This Brand, I wouldn't wonder to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Z Southern Cali USA

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the most useful wallet around.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wallet, I actually ordered this one as a spare in case anything ever happens to the first one I got. This wallet has so many credit card holding slots and other features that I will never use another model or brand as long as they keep making this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Smith

customer_reviews.title: He really liked that the wallet was thin and fit comfortably in ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet a year ago as a gift for my husband. He really liked that the wallet was thin and fit comfortably in his back pocket. The leather is soft and the wallet has maintained it's shape. This year one of my sons washed his wallet in the laundry and the other son had his stolen. So I am getting 2 Alpine Swiss wallets to replace their old wallets. I'm sure their experiences will be just as good as my husbands. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great quality wallet
customer_reviews.text: Really like the wallet and right size. One thing special for the case is that your credit card magnetic seems not to work any more. I have to take card out to any magnetic card in this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Very handsome wallet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wallet. It replaced an old wallet I had for years. A old Christmas present I was hesitant to throw away even though it looked very worn. At first I thought this wallet was a bit tight for credit cards to insert. But It became easier after a while without stretching or damaging it. It is also smaller and fits better in my pockets than the old one did. Very handsome. Well-made. You won't regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Neros

customer_reviews.title: Third fold out makes this wallet bulky.  Lack of bill separator is a detriment
customer_reviews.text: The third fold out for credit cards makes this wallet bulky. . I simply cut the third fold out off. Also, the Alpine Swiss wallet I replaced had a separator to separate small bills from large bills. ..
customer_reviews.author: Betty Biddulph

customer_reviews.title: Useful accessory
customer_reviews.text: Only had two weeks, at first with all slots filled with cards the unit will not fold. after a week the leather has loosen up. And starts to look more like real leather now. First glance after unpacking it look questionable. So far I am very please , with it and the cost. I think as time goes on the unit will wear quite well. Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin A. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Best wallet
customer_reviews.text: The best wallet I've ever had. Well made in leather, it has the characteristic smell of new leather. Looks and feel sturdy and probably will last for a long time. The feature I like the most is the many credit card slots and the visible ID slot. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Caused Back Ache
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks of the wallet but it's functionality is not great. If you use all the slots for cards, then the wallet is too thick to fold and comfortably fit in a back pocket, which is where I naturally carry my wallet. If you leave the tri-fold slots empty but put in more than a few bills (folding money) same issue. I carried it for a couple of weeks and discovered I was getting backaches. Thought it was my bed until I tried not carrying the wallet for a few days. Backache went away. I will use it for an overflow wallet only and carry it in my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: dough809

customer_reviews.title: Quality item, well made.  Cards can be hard to pull out of the pockets.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Nice item. Leather is free of defects. Seems well-constructed. Lightweight. Versatile pockets. Cons: It's pretty thick once it's loaded up. And with a few cards in there, the pockets get really tight. That's good - because the cards don't fall out. That's bad - because the cards to come out (easily). Bottom line: It's as good as any other wallet, I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great for front or back pocket
customer_reviews.text: Great for front or back pocket it's nice and soft, doesn't need the "breaking in". My husband loves it. Money places to put it. Plenty of room for credit cards , medical cards, nice fold out for quick ID . Not too thick even with everything in it. Very reasonable price. I bought 2 , 1 a little wider, he wants to keep both. He'll use the other later when he needs a new one. Ok with me. It's hard to find a nice soft good wallet for men.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha

customer_reviews.title: Skinny Card Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it contains all my credit cards and cash. BUT there is a problem with the card slots being to small. Chinese credit cards must be smaller in size to the American cards. You may need to do a little adjusting here. I'm going to try one of those wonder wallets advertised on TV. My wife says I'm a Wallet hoarder since I have a bag of them that I don't like. I'll find the right one some day.
customer_reviews.author: Partime

product_meta.title: Alpine Swiss RFID Protected Mens Spencer Leather Wallet Bifold 2 ID Windows Divided Bill Section Comes in Gift Box
feature_bullets: SPENCER FLIP ID – MSRP $45 – Our most popular design is a modern bifold wallet that lends functionality and style. The Spencer Flip ID Bifold features a familiar layout bringing together best in class for bifold design and hybrid trifold functionality. After a few weeks of use, this genuine leather wallet will begin to stretch and conform according to your needs, just like an expensive pair of leather shoes. Pro Tip – This wallet has a divided bill section to separate large and small bills.

FUNCTIONAL – Measurements: 4 3/8" L x 3 1/2" W x 3/4" H. Divided lined bill section, 2 ID windows, 8 horizontal credit card slots and 4 vertical pockets. Pro Tip – 4 vertical pockets under the card slots add a tremendous amount of carrying capacity. If you need lots of room this is the wallet for you!

YORK COLLECTION – Original classic line accented with our rounded cross logo. Comes in a black Alpine Swiss gift box. The York Collection features dressy traditional leathers that are ethically sourced and processed using sustainable eco-friendly methods.

SOFT NAPPA LEATHER – This wallet is skillfully crafted from quality genuine cowhide nappa leather. The barely-there pebble grain texture is buttery soft to the touch making it both luxurious and pliable to easily conform to fit multiple cards per slot.

RFID PROTECTED: Certified independent lab tests in Met Labs Santa Clara, CA facility. Secure your personal data for credit card RFID chips operating at 13.56 MHz frequency while allowing use of 125 KHz proximity cards such as ID badges, hotel cards & some transit cards.
